scripts.test:gbdk: npx tsc && node build/index.js --gbdk --enable-objects --object-field string gbdkString.dialogue --output-dir test/gbdk --tiled assets/World1Area1.tmx
scripts.test:rgbds: npx tsc && node build/index.js --rgbds --enable-objects --object-field string gbdkString.dialogue --output-dir test/rgbds --tiled assets/World1Area1.tmx
scripts.test:gbdk:ldtk: npx tsc && node build/index.js --gbdk --enable-objects --object-field string gbdkString.dialogue --output-dir test/rgbds --ldtk assets/ldtk-test-project.ldtk
scripts.build:package: npm run build && npm run package
scripts.package: npm run package:windows && npm run package:linux && npm run package:macos
